title: Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride -Faux Leather, Gold Foil 'Future Mrs' Wedding Binder I Includes Pen, Bookmark & Stickers I Engagement Gifts for Women I Wedding Planning Book Checklist
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

---

**Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride**

**Cover Material:** Faux Leather  
**Cover Design:** Gold Foil 'Future Mrs'  
**Ideal for:** US Weddings  
**Gift Idea for:** Engagement for Women

**Product Details:**

- **Included Items:**
  - Gold Pen
  - Bookmark with the quote "One step closer to marrying my soulmate"
  - 3 Stickers
- **Interior Design:** Green Leaf
- **Closure Type:** Magnetic Strap
- **Planner Specifics:**
  - **Calendar Duration:** 18 months (Undated)
  - **Checklist Duration:** 12 months
  - **Features:** 
    - Budget Tracker
    - Guest Lists
    - Seating Planner
    - Vows
    - Vendor Contact Logs
- **Binder Type:** Golden Open/Close Binder
- **Customizability:** Yes, add, remove, or rearrange pages as needed
- **Engagement Gift Quality:** High
- **Manufacturer:** Small US Business

**Customer Support:**
- Contact us for any concerns and assistance.

**Customer Reviews:**
- This planner has everything a bride-to-be needs to stay organized and on top of her wedding planning. The faux leather cover and gold foil design make it not only functional but also a beautiful addition to any bride's collection. The customizable sections allow for personalization and adapting to the unique needs of each wedding.

**Why Choose This Planner?**

- **Comprehensive Planning Tools:** With a 18-month undated calendar and 12-month checklist, this planner ensures you have ample time to manage your wedding preparations.
- **Professional Features:** The budget tracker, guest lists, seating planner, vows, and vendor contact logs provide all the necessary tools to keep your planning organized and systematic.
- **High-Quality Design:** The faux leather cover with gold foil 'Future Mrs' design and green leaf interior make this planner both elegant and durable.
- **Customizable:** You can tailor the planner to fit your specific needs, adding or removing pages as required.

**Ideal for Brides-to-Be:**

This planner is perfect for any bride-to-be who wants to ensure her wedding day is nothing short of magical. Whether you're a seasoned planner or just starting, this organizer will keep you on track and help create a memorable wedding experience.

**Customer Service:**

We are committed to providing exceptional customer service. If you have any concerns or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.

**Order Now:** Start planning your dream wedding today with our Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride!

**Manufacturer:** Small US Business
